meanings.sent1: He was whumping the nail into the wood with a hammer.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith was whumping the hot metal on the anvil.
meanings.sent3: The chef was whumping the dough to make it soft and fluffy.
meanings.sent4: The waves whumped against the shore, creating a rhythmic sound.
meanings.sent5: The boxer's fist whumped into his opponent's jaw, knocking him out.

meanings.sent1: The whumping of the door echoed through the house.
meanings.sent2: He felt a sharp whumping on his back as the bully hit him.
meanings.sent3: The whumping of the bass drum added a powerful beat to the music.
meanings.sent4: The whumping of the waterfall could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent5: The whumping of the falling tree branches startled the hikers in the forest.

meanings.definition: The sound of a heavy impact.
meanings.sent1: The whumping of the book hitting the floor startled the cat.
meanings.sent2: The whumping of the basketball hitting the court echoed in the gym.
meanings.sent3: The whumping of the hammer on the nail made a rhythmic pattern.
meanings.sent4: The whumping of the thunder shook the windows of the house.
meanings.sent5: The whumping of the falling tree branch made everyone look up in alarm.
